Subject: EPP writes every ~10 seconds a 0 byte .tpm file in temp directory
Description:
Hello Support Team,
We have noticed that EPP is writing almost every 10 seconds a 0 byte .tmp file in c:windowstemp.
For an endpoint, currently there are about 70k files.

Is this behaviour expected? Could you let us know the logic behind?

Thanks,
-serhat
